column1: Smoque BBQ////Definitely the best ribs that I've had so far. Even though the line's kind of long
column2: it's worth the wait. That night
column5: Pulled Pork and Peach Cobbler. The ribs're very tender and flavorful! The Peach Cobbler's amazing
column6: everyone should definitely try one. If you guys like ribs
column7: make sure to stop by this place.
